item.title: What Do People Look for in Someone to Date?
item.description: Introduction Photo by Joe Yates on Unsplash What is love? Love can be amazing, enjoyable, joyful; love can also be depressing, devastating, harmful. Undoubtedly, romantic relationships are complicated and perplexing. For years, researchers have spent effort attempting to figure out what makes people fall in love. People might have found their significant others in school, work, or other social situations. Speed dating is among one of the rising ways for people searching for a romantic relationship.
